title: "Road features that predict crash sites identified in new machine-learning model"
excerpt: "Issues such as abrupt changes in speed limits and incomplete lane markings are among the most influential factors that can predict road crashes, finds new research. The study then used machine learning to predict which roads may be the most dangerous based on these features."
